description: Mylene Flare Jenius (Tomo Sakurai), along with Basara Nekki (Nobutoshi Hayashi), promote the Macross 7 TV series as well as show off many of the Macross 7 merchandise.  Also on this video, you can see for a split second a small section of the unpublished script by David Newman, "Macross: Final Outpost: Earth".  (From macrosshare.com)

titles.title: Shounen Ace Original Edition Macross 7 Premium
